##Bringing in the Data 

``` {r}
library(spData)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(units)

#Load in the "World" dataset
data(world)

#Load in the "States" boundaries
data(us_states)
```

###Creation of the Map
``` {r}
world <- albers="+proj=aea +lat_1=29.5 +lat_2=45.5 +lat_0=37.5 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs"

ggplot()
